verses.name: Judges 5:10
verses.text: Speak, ye that ride on white asses, ye that sit in judgment, and walk by the way.

verses.name: Judges 5:11
verses.text: They that are delivered from the noise of archers in the places of drawing water, there shall they rehearse the righteous acts of the Lord, even the righteous acts toward the inhabitants of his villages in Israel: then shall the people of the Lord go down to the gates.

verses.name: Judges 5:12
verses.text: Awake, awake, Deborah: awake, awake, utter a song: arise, Barak, and lead thy captivity captive, thou son of Abinoam.
